imdb.plot outline: JOURNEY OF THE UNIVERSE: CONVERSATIONS is an expansive, multidisciplinary project that re-imagines the universe story and the human role in the flourishing of the Earth community. The series invites viewers to become fellow travelers on an immense journey from the beginnings of the universe, to the origins of life, to our current emergence as a planetary presence.
imdb.title: Journey of the Universe: Conversations
akas: Journey of the Universe: Conversations (United States)
plot: JOURNEY OF THE UNIVERSE: CONVERSATIONS is an expansive, multidisciplinary project that re-imagines the universe story and the human role in the flourishing of the Earth community. The series invites viewers to become fellow travelers on an immense journey from the beginnings of the universe, to the origins of life, to our current emergence as a planetary presence.
